children.value: Custom Rules allow you to protect your website and your APIs from malicious or excessive incoming traffic.
app to define the following rule types:
— Control incoming traffic by filtering requests. Perform actions like
on incoming requests according to rules you define.
— Check for excessive incoming traffic and apply mitigation actions.
Custom Rules are built upon the
which you can use to define rules and actions in several Cloudflare products.
Custom Rules are only available for selected customers on an Enterprise plan. Contact your Cloudflare Customer Success Manager to get access.
